content: gorgeous little baby jacket pattern ideal for a boy or girl knit this with or without the collar - you choose sizes large preemie/small newborn 0 - 3 months 3 - 6 months 6 - 9 months requirements dk 8ply yarn - 70g for the 0 -3months size 4mm needles small buttins a matching hat and baby blanket are also available a lovely gender-neutral baby shower gift **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
